title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives from Java to Resource and back to Java, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. It reverts to its original size and position.
EB: The CVS repository view should stay maximized even after switching perspectives. It should retain its maximized state until explicitly minimized by the user.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective. 2. Double click the title bar to maximize it. 3. Switch to the Resource perspective. 4. Return to the Java perspective.
